scripts.deploy: npm run build && awslocal cloudformation deploy --template-file template-local.yaml --stack-name vue-app-stack --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM && npm run upload && npm run website-url
scripts.upload: awslocal s3 sync dist/ s3://$(awslocal cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name vue-app-stack --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey==`BucketName`].OutputValue' --output text) --delete
scripts.website-url: echo '\nüåê Website URL:' && awslocal cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name vue-app-stack --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey==`WebsiteURL`].OutputValue' --output text
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run format:check
